en-US.summary: Save Christmas by helping Santa find a missing gift!
examplePhrases: Alexa ask North Pole Adventure where am I?
en-US.name: North Pole Adventure
en-US.description:
In this game you explore Santa's home at the north pole trying to help him find his missing gift! 

 To start, say "Alexa, start North Pole Adventure" or "Alexa, open North Pole Adventure". At any time you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
